item.title: Jeep Flip Knit Hat Beanie Licensed and Authentic
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Looking for a Jeep hat for your outdoor activities? We offer a wide range of Jeep inspired lightweight caps and warm beanies. Explore our wide selection of high-quality headwear for men and women and choose from a variety of styles and vibrant colors to show off your love for Jeep!We ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $29.00
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:25:42 UTC – Details)


Looking for a Jeep hat for your outdoor activities? We offer a wide range of Jeep inspired lightweight caps and warm beanies. Explore our wide selection of high-quality headwear for men and women and choose from a variety of styles and vibrant colors to show off your love for Jeep!We offer the best selection of Jeep themed headwear for you to choose from. With plenty of different styles and color options, you are most likely to find the perfect hat for yourself and everyone else in the family. Just browse through our amazing collection and see for yourself! Are you looking for a classic adjustable Jeep baseball cap with an embroidered logo, a warm and comfortable knitted Jeep beanie for cooler days of the year? Interested in a unisex camo Jeep hat that is perfect for outdoor enthusiasts or a cool Jeep girl hat? We’ve got it for you! We also have durable and comfortable Jeep trucker hats and Jeep Wrangler hats. Combining top quality, functionality, and unmatched style, our Jeep hats are must-have for any Jeep owner. They are great for your outdoor adventures, workout routines, and simply for adding a finishing touch to your casual outfits. Made from the finest materials with a “one size fits all” adjustable closure, any Jeep cap feels just as good as expected and is sure to please. All our hats and caps are rich in stylish and functional details, which make any of them unique. Any of them makes an excellent gift idea for your friends and loved ones. Our stylish Jeep hats and caps offer American quality. They are designed for comfort so you can’t go wrong adding any of them to your wardrobe.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 7 x 8 x 1 inches
Item model number ‏ : ‎ KH-JeepFlip
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ January 15, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Detroit Shirt
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08T6LZ86D

Embroidered
One size fits most
A Detroit Shirt Company exclusive item
Jeep, the Jeep grille and related logos, vehicle model names and trade dress are trademarks of FCA US LLC and used under license by Detroit Shirt Company. 2019 FCA US LLC.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);
var onlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineInput’);
var offlineStoreInputForm = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineInput’);
var onlineUrl = document.querySelector(‘#onlineUrl’);
var onlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlinePriceRaw’);
var onlineShippingRaw = document.querySelector(‘#onlineShippingRaw’);
var onlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#onlineDay’);
var onlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#onlineMonth’);
var onlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#onlineYear’);
var onlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#onlineCalendar’);

var offlineStoreName = document.querySelector(‘#offlineStoreName’);
var offlineCity = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCity’);
var offlineState = document.querySelector(‘#offlineState’);
var offlinePriceRaw = document.querySelector(‘#offlinePriceRaw’);
var offlineDay = document.querySelector(‘#offlineDay’);
var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);
var offlineYear = document.querySelector(‘#offlineYear’);
var offlineCalendar = document.querySelector(‘#offlineCalendar’);

var thankYouDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_thank’);
var errorDiv = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_error’);
var submitButton = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_submit’);
var loadingGifDiv = document.querySelector(‘#loading’);

var stateDefaultOption = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultOption’);
var stateDefaultPrompt = document.querySelector(‘#stateDefaultPrompt’);

if (thankYouDiv) {
thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (errorDiv) {
errorDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (loadingGifDiv) {
loadingGifDiv.innerHTML = ”;
}
if (submitButton) {
submitButton.style.display = ‘block’;
}
onlineUrl.value = ”;
onlinePriceRaw.value = ”;
onlineShippingRaw.value = ”;
offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,
onlineYear,
currentYear,
offlineYear,
onlineStoreInputForm,
offlineStoreInputForm,
enableOfflineStoreRadio,
enableOnlineStoreRadio,
onlineCalendar,
offlineCalendar
);
}

});

Price: $38.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:39:25 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

Advantage :
1. 180° flip camera
2. Easy to use and carry
3. With 11 funny frames
4. Come with 8GB SD card

Prysyedawn Kids Phone

In order to stimulate children’s desire for exploration and interest in photography, we upgraded the Prysyedawn phone with a new high-definition 180° flip camera configuration. Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Small size, easy to carry. suitable for outdoor travel use, allow kids to explore their creativity and curiosity. Your child will have their first own fake phone, you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone.

Specifications :
Display Screen: 2 inch
Battery Capacity: 600mAh
Charging Time: 2-3 Hours
Charging Cable: USB Type-C cable
Support 3.5mm Headphone Jack
System Languages: 20 languages are supported. e.g. English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian, German, Portuguese, etc.

Cute Stickers and Frames

This toddler phone can be flipped 180° to take cute photos. The sticker camera with 11 cute stickers can choose. Let your little girls get creative by taking photos and the lifetime more interesting.

Wallpapers & Desktop

10 wallpapers, 5 styles of desktop to choose from. Let your child experience the joy of different wallpapers.

Alarm Clock

This phone can teach kids to follow a schedule and develop autonomy by setting alarms to do homework, brush teeth, or go to bed. (only set 4 alarms)

Flashlight

Let the child from being scared when they are in the dark. (Be careful when using the flashlight, Don’t point the light directly at people or animals, as it may cause eye damage.)

4 Funny Puzzle Games

4 Interesting learning games that can develop children’s intelligence and exercise their ability to react and think.

Perfect Gift for Kids Ages 3-6

Kids like taking selfies, videos, large Storage to meet the needs of kids. This Phone toy can store thousands of photos, and kids can recall everything he has recorded! At the same time, you can download music that your child likes to listen to, which helps to develop language and reasoning skills, as well as enhance your child’s memory and creativity. The perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 4 5 6.

Notice:

1. Do not disassemble the battery.

2. Use the USB cable to connect to the computer. The phone will display charging and the computer will read the disk. You can download photos or music.

3. For adding new music, please confirm the downloaded music is in MP3 format.

4. Our fake phone has no call capabilities, so you don’t need to buy a SIM card for this.

【Upgraded Toddler Cell Phone】Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Equipped with auto Focus, 8.0 Mega pixels and 1080P Video. Greatly improved the definition of photos. With Big head sticker shooting, children can take photos with frames, leave some hilarious photos with family or friends. And it has a high-quality speaker that can support a 3.5mm headphone jack. It is good for children to learn and listen to music.
【180° Flip Camera】Upgraded to flip-camera configuration, Easy to take selfies. Just open the switch key to enjoy the fun of taking photos. With 10 wallpapers and 5 desktops, kids can switch between their favorite wallpapers. Kids music player Includes a portable lanyard hang, easy to carry and move. Includes a video recorder, Alarm clock, game, and voice recorder for more creative ways to play.
【Powerful Battery Life】Continuously taking photos or listening to music for 1-2 hours after fully charged! Come with 1*USB Type-C cable & 1*8GB micro SD card to store thousands of photos!
【Safe & Durable Shockproof】This toddler music player is used high quality non-toxic soft plastic, more safe and comfortable for children’s skin. The shockproof shell provides effective anti-fall protection.
【Great Gift for Kids】Perfect birthday, Christmas, festival, and holiday gifts for boys and girls aged 3~6. Children love taking photo with extremely cute cell phone. Simply capture scene or animals on nature with family, experience the fun from nature. In addition, your child will have their first own fake phone, and you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone again.






Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

  • Advantage :
  • 1. 180° flip camera
  • 2. Easy to use and carry
  • 3. With 11 funny frames
  • 4. Come with 8GB SD card

item.title: USA Toyz Astroshot Zero GX Glow in The Dark Shooting Games for Kids – Nerf Compatible Floating Ball Targets for Shooting with 1 Foam Blaster Toy Gun, 10 Floating Ball Targets, and 5 Flip Targets
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) COMPLETE SHOOTING TARGETS GAME KIT: The Astroshot Zero GX multi player target shooting game set includes 1 target shooting gallery, 1 foam dart gun toy, 12 soft foam darts, 1 dart clip, 10 floating ball targets, and 5 knock down targetsFLOATING BALL TARGET PRACTICE FOR KIDS: Load each toy gun ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $28.64
(as of Nov 30,2022 07:36:26 UTC – Details)



COMPLETE SHOOTING TARGETS GAME KIT: The Astroshot Zero GX multi player target shooting game set includes 1 target shooting gallery, 1 foam dart gun toy, 12 soft foam darts, 1 dart clip, 10 floating ball targets, and 5 knock down targets
FLOATING BALL TARGET PRACTICE FOR KIDS: Load each toy gun with 1 soft foam dart at a time, cock, aim, and knockdown all gun targets from up to a 20ft shooting range; these toy guns are compatible with Nerf guns, targets, and accessories
2 WAYS TO PLAY: Flip the switch on the module to activate the floating ball shooting game targets or install the flip targets; switch on the galactic soundtrack or not and play with family and friends
DURABLE INDOOR TOY SPECS: The target practice shooting gallery features glow in the dark pieces, 2 leg supports for stability, measures 13.5” W x 9.5” H, and requires (4) C batteries (not included); these indoor target games are safe for kids ages 6+
KID-SAFE AND QUALITY ASSURED: The Astroshot Zero GX is great for solo play or for playing with family and friends; We’ll provide a full refund if you’re not thrilled with these shooting target toys for boys and girls

4.5

Price: $19.88
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:52 UTC – Details)


This Tracfone Alcatel A406 prepaid cell phone serves as a useful alternative to people who don’t want to commit to a month-to-month cell service plan. With this prepaid phone, You can pay as you go. This allows you to track the amount of money you’re spending easily. The prepaid Flip phone is easy to use and helps you keep track of your day-to-day. The phone book holds up to 1, 000 entries, and the hands-free speaker allows you to connect easily while driving. Listen to your favorite tunes on the MP3 player, and take photos and videos to share with friends and family.
Google Is Here To Assist You. As part of the KaiOS experience, the MY FLIP 2 comes preloaded with Google Assistant, which helps you get things done and find answers on the go, using just your voice.
Accessibility For All. The MY FLIP 2 comes with a host of accessibility features Real-Time-Text (RTT) and hearing aid compatibility that enables any user to easily stay connected. Plus, a dedicated external SOS button allows the user to call for help in case of an emergency.
BIG BUTTONS and large, legible numbers and make dialing effortless.
POWERFUL SPEAKER ensures every conversation will be loud and clear.

  1. Take control of your wireless life

    Tracfone offers Unlimited Talk and Text plans with Unlimited Carryover Data*

  2. Now you’re in control

    Experience wireless freedom. You don’t want to be locked into a contract, that’s why Tracfone doesn’t have them. Plus, there are no activation or cancellation fees, ever.



Choose Your Refill


Unlimited Talk & Text Plus 3GB


Unlimited Talk & Text Plus 4GB


Unlimited Talk & Text Plus 8GB

Plan Type

No-contract individual plan

Plan Type

No-contract individual plan

Plan Type

No-contract individual plan

Talk, Text

Unlimited

Talk, Text

Unlimited

Talk, Text

Unlimited

Service Days

30 Days of Service

Service Days

30 Days of Service

Service Days

30 Days of Service

Data

3GB Carryover Data at High Speed

Data

4GB Carryover Data at High Speed

Data

8GB Carryover Data at High Speed

How will my plan card be delivered?

A physical Tracfone plan card will be shipped directly to you.

Do I need a PIN to go with this plan?

The PIN to activate your new plan is on the back of the plan card. You do not need a separate PIN.

Do I need a SIM card with this plan?

You’ll need a Tracfone compatible phone (which comes with a built-in SIM card) or Keep Your Own Phone SIM Kit to activate service. If you already have an active Tracfone phone, add your plan to your account by following the instructions on the card.

How do I activate service with Tracfone?

You can activate service on the Tracfone website. You’ll need the IMEI/MEID/Serial # from a Tracfone phone or Tracfone SIM Card and a service plan PIN ready. Follow the step-by-step instructions provided in your package.

Where can I buy a phone that is compatible with this wireless service plan?

All Tracfone phones available on Amazon are compatible with this plan or you can activate service on a phone you already have with a Tracfone Keep Your Own Phone SIM Kit.

Disclaimers

*Unlimited Carryover: For Unlimited Talk & Text Smartphone plans, any unused data after your service end date will carryover to the next cycle if active service is maintained and in use with any Unlimited Talk & Text Smartphone plan. For other service plans, any unused minutes, texts and data will not expire as long as any Tracfone service plan is active and in use within any six-month period.

4
Price: $19.88
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:22:52 UTC – Details)

The 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket features three interchangeable sockets store on the driver shaft to avoid any loose pieces that can get lost. The tool is impact rated for use with any impact driver. A powerful Rare-Earth magnet allows the sockets to hold onto any fasteners. Sockets are color coded for easy identification. About Klein Tools

As an American manufacturer of hand tools for more than 160 years, Klein Tools makes premium-quality, professional-grade tools that deliver performance, durability and precision. Our team continues to put six generations of expertise into each tool by using the highest quality materials and superior workmanship.

Klein Tools doesn’t just make great products, we make great products that stand up to the demands of the professionals who use them every day … Since 1857.

Impact Driver, 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket Set with Handle, 6 Hex Driver Sizes plus a 1/4-Inch Bit Holder

The 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket features six hex driver sizes plus a bit holding feature to easily switch between sizes. Three interchangeable sockets store on the driver shaft to avoid any loose pieces that can get lost. The tool is impact rated for use with any impact driver.

  • 7-in-1 Impact Flip Socket Set includes six integrated hex sizes plus a 1/4-Inch bit holding feature
  • Quickly and easily change blade between a screwdriver handle and an impact driver
  • Includes 1/4-Inch, 5/16-Inch, 11/32-Inch, 3/8-Inch, 7/16-Inch and 1/2-Inch nut driver sizes
  • Multi-function 1/4-Inch socket has both shallow (driver) and deep (bit holder) configurations for added versatility
  • Powerful Rare-Earth Magnet securely holds bits and hex head fasteners
  • Features 1/4-Inch Quick-Connect adapter for easy use with an impact driver
  • Sockets are color coded for easy identification
  • Detachable sockets allow for easy removal of metal shavings from magnet
